abstract: Frank Bisignano, the chief administrative officer, will now add supervising the mortgage origination and loan payment collection businesses to his many duties.
snippet: Frank Bisignano, the chief administrative officer, will now add supervising the mortgage origination and loan payment collection businesses to his many duties.
lead_paragraph: Hoping to troubleshoot some of the problems plaguing its mortgage operations, Jamie Dimon dispatched one of his top lieutenants on Friday to oversee the Chase Home Lending business.

headline.main: JPMorgan Names New Head for Mortgage Business
